name: akamai-nginx
description: generate nginx config from akamai property

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && EDGEGRID_ENV=test ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --timeout 10000 --compilers js:babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill $(find dist/test -name '*.js')
scripts.start:
npm run build && echo '
#### STARTING ####' && node dist/start.js
scripts.start-local:
npm run build && echo '
#### STARTING ####' && node dist/start-local.js

author: Andrew Vaughan <andrewv@smartcreations.com.au> (https://halt.sh)
